casebody.data:
B. R. Smith, et al., appellants, v. Charles C. Hardwick, respondent. Decided December 7, 1885. Appeal from judgment entered on referee’s report, dismissing complaint on the merits. R. L. Harrison, for appellant. Butler, Stillman & Hubbard, for respondents.

Before Sedgwick, Oh. J., and Freedman, J.

Per Curiam.

The judgment appealed from should be affirmed upon the opinion of the referee.
